isis.stitle: TSI 02-47-05 - Engine Compartment Modification to Increase Fuel Filter Canister Clearance

subjectgroup.subject: Engine Compartment Modification to Increase Fuel Filter Canister Clearance

geninfo.para: This procedure increases the clearance between the fuel filter canister and the davenport. It will remove a 4 inch square piece of the engine compartment and replace it with a recessed davenport plate that has a one-inch inset.

svcproc.stitle: TSI 02-47-05 - Engine Compartment Modification to Increase Fuel Filter Canister Clearance
svcproc.title: SERVICE PROCEDURE

warning.para: To avoid property damage or personal injury, or both, possibly death, park the vehicle on a flat level surface, chock the wheels, set the parking brake, and shut engine off before performing this service procedure.

note.para: The bracket in the photos is not painted for training purposes only.

step1.para: Measure a 4 inch square on the lower corner of the left davenport. Using a straight edge, draw an outline of the square.

warning.para: To avoid personal injury, always wear safety glasses or a face shield when using air tools, grinder, or drill.

step1.para: Using an air chisel cut out the marked sheet metal square (Figure 1). Use a grinder to deburr and smooth the cut edge until the recessed davenport plate, Part Number 451842001, flange can sit flush against the sheet metal.

figure.caption: Figure 1. Cut Out Marked Sheet Metal Square

step1.para: Hold the recessed davenport plate in position. Locate and drill (7) mounting holes with a number 27 drill bit (refer to Figure 3).

figure.caption: Figure 2. Apply Sealer to Recessed Davenport Plate

step1.para: Apply sealer, Part Number 810000, to the back surfaces and flanges of the recessed davenport plate (Figure 2).
Holding the recessed davenport plate into position and install (7) number 10 screws (Figure 3).
Completely seal around the recessed davenport plate ensuring all gaps are filled with sealant.

figure.caption: Figure 3. Completely Seal Around Recessed Davenport Plate
